topicTitle: Earforce Z1 turtle beach headset.......please help!

posts.postText:
I just got the headset listed in the title and its awesome, only problem......people cant hear me :C
I need help because i dont want to waste 40$ on a headset that has a mic problem.

http://k-12.pisd.edu/projector/cta/audiotosoundcard2.jpg 
Here.




On a serious note, have you tried testing the mic in places other than Gmod?
Or have you set it to the default mic on steam?

It won't recognize it on the steam settings. Is there a driver for the headphones that I need?


This post just became 27 times more awesome.
-Norple
Do you use HDMI? My X11s have the same issue when I try to use them with HDMI plugs in my computer.
Control panel> sound. Change your devices so that all the ones you don't use(give no input, have no output) are disabled. Then set your head phones to default.

The computer won't identify the headphones :L


This post just became 27 times more awesome.
-Norple
